moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nf6: i don't even know what the name of this opening is but i saw someone play it so i decided to try it!!
moves.3. Nxe5 Qe7 4. d4 d6 5. Nd3 Nxe4 6. Qe2: well that was a rather boring opening I ain't playing it again!!
moves.9. Bf4 O-O 10. Nc3 c6 11. Be2 Re8 12. O-: i am trying to give life to this utterly boring game!!
moves.13. a3 Nd7: I am aiming for the c4 square!!
moves.17. Nba2 Ndc4: finally i have a knight at c4!! i am surprised white didn't try to stop me he probably wasn't on the same wavelength!!
moves.18. Bxc4 Nxc4 19. b3: blunder!! rook to b1 or knight to d1 would be better. but this moves are defensive i guess my opponent doesn't like being bullied around!!
moves.21. Bc1: agian this move just shows that my opponent is only in attack/counterattack mode and doesn't want to defend!!
moves.21... Rxe2 22. Nxe2 Nxc2: well now i force him to defend!!
moves.23. Nec3: i guess he still doen't want to be defensive oh well!!
moves.23... Nxd4 24. Be3: maybe he doesn't know how to defend!!
moves.24... Nxb3 25. Nxb4 axb4 26. Rb1: and he is still attacking/counter attacking!!
moves.27. Rxb3 Ra1+ 28. Kf2 d4: i bet my house he is gonna take the pawn!!
true to his style his last move is an attacking move!!
moves.32... Be8: well my opponent either got tired of attacking or realized how pathetic/predictable his future attacks were going to be and resigned!! what did we learn from this? is that you can't win a game if you can't defend! lol!! but the thing i will remember about this game is that my opponent is rated 1800+ but yet he played so poorly!!
